thread.title: To infinity and beyond: Toy Story land coming to Disney 's Hollywood Studios
thread.title_full: To infinity and beyond: Toy Story land coming to Disney 's Hollywood Studios

title: To infinity and beyond: Toy Story land coming to Disney 's Hollywood Studios
text:
By Cox Media Group National Content Desk ANAHEIM, Calif. — 
Star Wars Land was the talk of this weekend's D23 Expo, but another mega change was announced for Disney's Hollywood Studios in Orlando. 
Woody and Buzz are going to have not just one overly popular ride, but an entire land dedicated to the Toy Story franchise. 
Already a feature at Hong Kong Disneyland, Toy Story Land will encompass 11 acres of the theme park dedicated to old-time Hollywood. Breaking: #ToyStoryLand just announced for Disney’s Hollywood Studios. More: http://t.co/D4VtFXEBU6 #D23Expo pic.twitter.com/gCC8duz3FJ — Disney Parks (@DisneyParks) August 15, 2015 
The park already includes Toy Story Midway Mania, where riders play virtual, 4-D carnival games while riding in a spinning car. It has been popular since the ride opened nearly a decade ago, and a Buzz and Woody meet-and-greet in a section of the park called Pixar Place. #ToyStoryLand to include Alien Swirling Saucers, expanded Toy Story Mania & more! http://t.co/D4VtFXEBU6 #D23Expo pic.twitter.com/NgrBGch8ce — Disney Parks (@DisneyParks) August 15, 2015 
The new land will include a family-friendly roller coaster where riders sit on Slinky Dog's back, an alien saucer and an expanded Midway Mania, Disney Parks reported.
